subject: Mathematics
title: Introduction to Binomial Coefficient
description: The binomial coefficient is a mathematical concept that represents the number of ways to choose k elements from a set of n elements. This article provides an introduction to the binomial coefficient, explains its formula, and demonstrates its applications in combinatorics.
objectives: Understand the concept of binomial coefficient
Learn the formula to calculate binomial coefficient
Learn the recursive formula for binomial coefficient
Explore the applications of binomial coefficient in combinatorics
